titles.title: To revise the boundary of the North Platte National Wildlife Refuge.
An Act to revise the boundary of the North Platte National Wildlife Refuge, to expand the Pettaquamscutt Cove National Wildlife Refuge, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife and Oceans.
Subcommittee Hearings Held.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 104-527.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 257.

action.text: Mr. Metcalf moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 461.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Amendment SP 4385 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Chafee.
Amendment SP 4385 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Saxton moved that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendments.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendments Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/27/1996--Passed Senate amended. TABLE OF CONTENTS: Title I: North Platte National Wildlife Refuge Title II: Pettaquamscutt Cove National Wildlife Refuge Title I: North Platte National Wildlife Refuge - Terminates the secondary jurisdiction of the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service over specified land at the North Platte National Wildlife Refuge in Nebraska. Revokes Executive Order Number 2446, dated August 21, 1916, with respect to the lands. Title II: Pettaquamscutt Cove National Wildlife Refuge - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Foddering Farm Acres in Rhode Island for addition to the Pettaquamscutt Cove National Wildlife Refuge. Revises the boundaries of the Refuge to include such Area. Provides for future expansion and adjustment of the boundaries of the Refuge through acquisition of lands, waters, and interests therein. Authorizes appropriations.
